title: FPS, Why do you do this to me?
body: I experience fps drops but the weird thing is that if I run the game on very high and low there is no difference in fps and still experience drops YES! even on low what is wrong with my computer? I can get 80 fps on medium but I put it on very low thinking that would solve the drops but i  still experience drops please help me...

replies.body: I'd suggest visiting the [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-windows) and performing the steps there.
